title: My First Web Page
description: This assignment was perform in the begging of the classes and the task was to create a static web page where I needed to implement a given design with linking between pages. In the project I used pure CSS and HTML code.

title: Layouting
description: After diving deeper into CSS, this assignment purpose was to create a proper layouting for a given design. Main focus was to display and positioning the elements.

title: Diving into JavaScript
description: First dynamic form created in JavaScript. This project covers functions, validation of inputs and if all fields are correctly filled it will display a modal box containing the name collected from the input.

title: Game app
description: Game app. This project was made in OOP style using a given API. From an array of JSON a list of games were rendered with the ability to delete, edit and update each elements from the list. Creating and adding a new element to JSON was also implemented. In this project fetch api (GET, POST, DELETE, PUT) and asynchronous functions were covered (async/await and  promises)

title: Obstacles Game
description: I this game the player has the ability to move inside the playground and at each time the player hits an obstacle loses 10 point from its life. At the point where his life will be equal to 0 the game will end (displaing a game over message) and the game will restart and randomly the obstacles will be rendered. ES6 syntax was covered in this game.

title: Weather App
description: Displays buttons to click for daily and hourly weather forecast based on the geolocation of the user. After getting the geolocation position with the navigator, the API was called in order to retrieved the necessary data from it and displaying it.

title: My Imdb page
description: My IMDB is a team project created at the end of the web development classes at Scoala Informala de IT. It was created using JS and Bootstrap technologies. Overall the application displays some movies coming form a database, it gives the user the opportunity to Register/ Login, add, delete or update a movie.
